Player History
Drafted in 12th round, 143rd overall pick, by Toronto in 2019...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/1/2019, off Philip Baer (OAK)...
Won Conference Championship with Toronto in 2019...
1/31/2020: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,207,143 through salary arbitration...
Signed as a free agent by Baltimore on 2/3/2021 to a 2-year deal worth $1,880,000 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/29/2021, hitting .440 with 1 HR, 5 RBI...
